name: UpwardCreditUnion
0:
”Alexa open upward credit union”
”Alexa ask upward credit union for balance”
”Alexa ask upward credit union for transactions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: upward credit union
des:
You can now stay on top of your finances with the UPWARD CREDIT UNION skill.You can ask Alexa for balances and recent transactions.

Once you've enabled the skill, you can ask such questions as:
 - "What's my checking account balance?"
 - "What are my recent transactions?"
 - "What are my savings account balance?"
 - "What's my credit card balance?"
 - "What's my monthly payment?"
 - "What's my car payment?"









































































































































































































































































Use of this skill will allow financial information to be read aloud or displayed visually.
